{"id":787872475,"lang":"cpp","time":"1Â month","timestamp":1661938114,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/787872475/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Longest Substring Without Repeating Characters","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int lengthOfLongestSubstring(string s) {\n        unordered_map<char,int> lastOccurrence;\n        int maxLength = 0;\n        int startIndex = 1;\n        int currLength = 0;\n        for (int i = 0; i < s.size(); i++) {\n            if (!lastOccurrence[s[i]]) {\n                currLength++;\n                lastOccurrence[s[i]] = i + 1;\n            }\n            else {\n                if (lastOccurrence[s[i]] >= startIndex) {\n                    maxLength = max(maxLength, currLength);\n                    startIndex = lastOccurrence[s[i]] + 1;\n                    currLength = i - startIndex + 1;\n                    lastOccurrence[s[i]] = i + 1;\n                }\n                else {\n                    currLength++;\n                    lastOccurrence[s[i]] = i + 1;\n                }\n            }\n        }\n        maxLength = max(maxLength, currLength);\n        return maxLength;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"longest-substring-without-repeating-characters"}
